Subject: The Vok Response
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:




Demon Wulf looked down at Reptilica, then back up to Zardus. 
"My brethren and I are new to this green planet.  We have no knowledge of the 
current positions of different Cybertronian factions.  Your servant that I 
have stabbed was of no use, my brethren and I are much better warriors.  We 
need a base to be in, and a competent leader to serve in.  An--" Demon Wulf 
saw rage go near Reptilica's body and he sighed, looking up to Zardus, in a 
bored way as if to say "Should I?", raising his sword, his red optics growing 
brighter by the second.
